BUILD WITH IT: LAPIS!与之搭建：青金石

Build with It: Lapis!与之搭建：青金石
Get ready to treasure lapis – a gem of a block designed to brighten up your builds in this week’s Build with It! Lapis is perfect for building. In fact, that’s one of its primary functions in Minecraft. Use the block to build your creations, or do a little crafting to dye other items a brilliant and bold blue. With lapis, the potential is only limited by the amount of materials you can store (like this treasure chest inspired build by Kimandjax)!准备好寻找青金石宝藏吧——这周的与之搭建将会给您一些用青金石点缀建筑的方法与建议！青金石用在建筑上是非常合适的，当然这也是它在MC里的主要功能之一。在建筑上用一些青金石块，或者用它制作一些小手工，把一些物件染成鲜艳亮丽的蓝色。有了青金石，你的建筑天赋将会只受它的储存量限制（就像Kimandjax建造的这个宝藏箱）！

DiamondBack662建造的漂亮屋顶
You could take a more subtle approach as well because we know the bright blue may not fit the rest of your design dreams. Still, if you’re dreaming of some sparkly ways to break up your stone builds, try using the ore inside your build as an accent like TommyPusherMC has done here below.
你也可以把一些更加精细的手法用到建筑上，因为我们也知道可能这个明亮的蓝色并不符合你建筑的初衷。不过，如果你想在建筑上加一些点睛之笔，你可以学学TommyPusherMC的办法——使用矿石来点缀你的建筑。

可以学习TommyPusherMC，把矿石在建筑上利用起来
Lapis can be used in all kinds of builds that need a blue hue. A tried and true style, you could use it within classic magic and fantasy castles or perhaps to represent a detour to the stars and beyond with a sci-fi motif. Don’t feel like building underwater with some of our more recent Build With It suggestions like prismarine and coral? Why not pay homage to your aquatic-themed dreams on land by using lapis to represent the ocean?青金石能充当所有以蓝色为基调的建筑中，这也是一种久经建筑师考验的写实风格，你可以在魔幻，奇幻的城堡中使用它，也可以在科幻主题建筑中用它来建造遥远的星系与星空。难道你不想借鉴我们的建议，用青金石来建造一些水下建筑？比如海晶石和珊瑚。为什么不用青金石来代表海洋，同时向你的海洋梦致敬呢？
Grab your mining gear, clear up your inventory space, and spend some time collecting as much lapis as you can carry because after you’ve stocked up, get ready to rock this block in all kinds of ways. We’ve included a few of these stylish community builds we received to help provide some inspiration.拿起你的采矿工具，清理你的背包，然后花足够多的时间来采集青金石吧！因为在收集整理之后，你就能以你独特的方式建造出令人惊叹的青金石建筑了。我们收录了社区里的一些青金石建筑，或许它们能够为你提供一些灵感。
